message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. 60/40 seems reasonable.
Let's split the difference.  65/35 is a fair compromise.
I understand you want a larger share, Bob, but my previous offer is already generous considering the inflation. I'm sticking with 60/40.

Bob, we're running out of time. I'm adjusting my offer to 55/45.  Let's close this deal and avoid losing everything to inflation.
Alice, I'm firm on my last offer. 75/25 is the best we can do, considering the inflation and limited time.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  We're both losing money due to inflation.  I propose a 50/50 split so we both get something! This is my final offer.
